title: Retail investors are easing back into crypto while VC funding rises for first time in 1.5 years
description:
Bitcoin prices climbed nearly 70% in the fourth quarter of 2023 and the crypto market has been rebounding, marking the re-entry of small retail investors. However, retail investors, who lost billions of dollars in the 2022 market crash, are moving in more slowly and cautiously this time, compared to the bull market in 2021, according […]

The post Retail investors are easing back into crypto while VC funding rises for first time in 1.5 years appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Crypto Analyst Warns Bitcoin Remains Vulnerable Above $50,000, Says Zero Reasons To Be Bullish on One DeFi Altcoin
description:
A widely followed crypto strategist thinks that Bitcoin (BTC) is in a tough spot even as it trades above $50,000. Analyst Justin Bennett tells his 112,000 followers on the social media platform X that BTC has hit the diagonal resistance of an ascending channel. An ascending channel is typically viewed as a bullish pattern as […]

The post Crypto Analyst Warns Bitcoin Remains Vulnerable Above $50,000, Says Zero Reasons To Be Bullish on One DeFi Altcoin appeared first on The Daily Hodl.
